title: Spicy chorizo squash parcels
description: These crisp little parcels are perfect to serve at parties, especially with a glass of Spanish red. For this recipe you will need a blender.
ingredients: 500g/1lb 2oz butternut squash, peeled, cored and cut into 15mm/¾in cubes (450g/1lb when peeled and cored)
sea salt and freshly ground black pepper
